title: Simulation/VR-Based Training Course for Strengthening Collaborative Learning Engagement Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Device Usage Skills and Foundational Language Learning Competencies
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning centered on group activities using VR simulation tools in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can self-diagnose collaborative learning participation levels within a group at level 3 or higher using an observational assessment rubric.
Perform three or more language tasks in a simulated environment, achieving at least 80% cognitive and emotional interaction among group members
Apply peer assessment and feedback techniques during collaborative problem-solving to improve learning efficiency by 25%
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
